name: Super Dino Tale
description:
This game was made by DumbCow for the Mini Jam 81: Kaiju.  A spiced classical game T-rex Runner including some features.

Scenario

Put in a world where dinosaurs are no longer gigantic, but those bloodlust humans. You are a newborn Dino, your mother has been taken away by a dinosaur hunter, leaving you astray and lonely on the wasteland. Accidently you found a map with a red circle, by the Dino instinct, you know exactly where to go. The journey begins.

How to play

Newly born, your instinct tells you:

  • Left mouse/ Up arrow to jump
  • Right mouse/ Down arrow to duck
  • Collect DinoDrink to feel better
  • Collect floaty items to trade at shops
  • Inc makes you better but nowhere likes home
Credits
  • DumbCow for making this game
  • Google for assets and tutorials
